advisories.title: APT29 Campaign Targeting Government Networks
advisories.description: APT29 (also known as Cozy Bear) has been observed conducting a new campaign targeting government networks. The campaign uses spear-phishing emails with weaponized Office documents to gain initial access, followed by lateral movement using legitimate administrative tools.
advisories.impact: Successful compromise could result in unauthorized access to sensitive government data, persistent network presence, and potential exfiltration of classified information.
recommendations: Implement email filtering to block suspicious attachments
Deploy endpoint detection and response (EDR) solutions
Monitor for unusual PowerShell and WMI activity
Review and update privileged account access policies
Conduct user awareness training on identifying phishing attempts
